name: Slaime
description:
I worked myself on this game so its far from perfect but i hope its not that bad. My game doesnt fit the theme very much. All the art i made myself aswell as programming stuff. Enjoy :P

!IMPORTANT!

The weeb version is very laggy and window is not sized corectly. If you can please play the download version.

Controls:

WSAD or ARROW KEYS - Movement

P - Pause

E - use
